string.name: forgotten_password
string.u: Click here if you have forgotten your password

resources.string: Please enter the registered email address and tap the button below. A mail with the URL for resetting will be sent. \n If you do not receive the e-mail, please re-tap the button after confirming that you do not set domain rejected setting.
Hello everyone, this is Tanaka. Now I am creating a website of a major advertising agency and an automobile manufacturer and I am looking for a designer.
Are you sure you want to log out?
Search by name or membership number
This message will be sent to all resedents. Do you really want to run it?
Start date cannot be less than or equal to current date
Password should be minimum of 6 characters
Allow auto start of Happ to never miss a notification
You can\'t reply to this conversation

This Terms of Service (\"Terms of Service\") is a service (hereinafter referred to as \"The Service\") provided by 9 GATES Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as \"The Company\") on this smartphone application It defines the terms of use of. For members of Co-work & Share. H (hereinafter referred to as \"users\"), use this service in accordance with these terms.
These Terms shall apply to all relationships relating to the use of this Service between users and the Company.
\u25CF Registration applicant applies for registration of use according to the method defined by the company, and approves this, and registration of use will be completed.

\u25CF We may not approve applications for use registration if we determine that the applicant for use registration has the following reasons and we do not under any obligation to disclose the reason.
\u25CC (1) When notifying of false matters at the time of application for use registration
\u25CC (2) In the case of an application from a person who has violated this agreement
\u25CC (3) In addition, when we judge that usage registration is not appropriate
\u25CF The user shall manage the user ID and password of this service at its own risk

\u25CF In any case, the user can not assign or lend the user ID and password to a third party. If the combination of user ID and password is logged in consistent with the registration information, we regard it as use by the user who registered the user ID.
\u25CF The user shall be able to use this service free of charge
In using the service, the user should not do the following actions.
\u25CF (1) Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
\u25CF (3) Acts of destroying or obstructing the function of our server or network
\u25CF (4) Acts that may interfere with the operation of our services
\u25CF (5) Acts of collecting or accumulating personal information etc. concerning other users
\u25CF (7) Acts of providing profit directly or indirectly to antisocial forces in connection with our services
\u25CF (8) Other acts that we deem inappropriate
Article 6 (Suspension of provision of this service etc.)
\u25CF The Company shall be able to suspend or suspend the provision of all or part of the Service without notifying the user in advance if judging that there is any of the following reasons.
\u25CC (1) When performing maintenance, inspection, or updating of the computer system related to this service
\u25CC (2) When it becomes difficult to provide this service due to force majeure such as earthquake, lightning strike, fire, blackout or natural disaster
\u25CC (3) When a computer or a communication line stops due to an accident
\u25CC (4) In addition, if we determine that it is difficult to provide this service
\u25CF We shall not bear any responsibility for any disadvantage or damage suffered by users or third parties due to suspension or interruption of the provision of this service, regardless of reason.
Article 7 (Limitation on use and deletion of registration)
\u25CF In the following cases, we may restrict the use of all or part of this service to the user without prior notice, or may cancel the registration as a user.
\u25CC (1) In the event of violating any provision of these Terms
\u25CC (2) When it turns out that there is a false fact in the registration matter
\u25CC (3) In the event that we judge that the use of this service is not appropriate
\u25CF We are not responsible for any damage caused to the user by the actions our company did under this section.
\u25CF The Company\'s obligation defaults shall be exempted from liability if it is not based on our intention or gross negligence.

\u25CF We are liable for compensation only within the range of damage that is normally incurred even if we take responsibility for some reason and within the range of payment amount (equivalent to one month in case of continuous service) for paid services Shall be assumed.
\u25CF We are not responsible for any transactions, communications or disputes, etc. arising between you and other users or third parties regarding this service.

The Company shall be able to change the content of this service or cancel the provision of this service without notifying the user and will not bear any responsibility for damage caused to the user by this.
We can change this agreement at any time without notifying the user if we deem it necessary.
The notice or contact between the user and the Company shall be made according to the method specified by the Company.
Article 12 (Prohibition of Transfer of Rights and Obligations)
The user can not transfer the rights or obligations under the terms of use or third agreement to third parties without prior consent of the Company in writing and can not be used as collateral.
\u25CF In interpreting these Terms, the Japanese law shall be the governing law.
\u25CF In the event of a dispute with respect to this Service, the court having jurisdiction over the head office location of the Company shall be subject to exclusive agreement jurisdiction.
